title: Beneath the Mountains (2R1)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Discard the top 3 cards from your draw deck to play a [Dwarven] weapon from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'There forged was blade, and bound was hilt; / The delver mined, the mason built.'”
Rarity:	R
